thread.section_title: Hotel Le Marquis - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Incredibly good
thread.title_full: Incredibly good - Review of Hotel Le Marquis, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: DiaJoyrise
title: Incredibly good
text: Hotel is absolutely beautiful, the staff is friendly and will go out of their way every day to make your stay pleasant. Recommend the king bed room, much more spacious, loved the terrace, the big windows open wide to let in fresh air. Breakfast is included and it's delicious! Everything from pastries to eggs, fruits and meats! Its clean and the bathroom is modern. Loved the tub where you can soak and the lavish shower. Would definitely be back again when in Paris
